author: ASFN Admin
title: Saints scratch Armstead, Colston; Falcons activate Jones (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,297 Saints scratch Armstead, Colston; Falcons activate Jones (Yahoo Sports) NEW ORLEANS (AP) -- The New Orleans Saints have scratched starting left tackle Terron Armstead and all-time receiver Marques Colston for Thursday night's game against Atlanta.
